timeline
    title AI Evolution: From Rules to Reasoning (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    
    1950s-1980s : Rule-Based Era
                : ELIZA (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
                : SHRDLU (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
                : MYCIN (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
                : AI Winter begins
    
    1990s-2000s : Statistical Revolution
                : Deep Blue vs Kasparov (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
                : Support Vector Machines
                : Limited data & compute
    
    2010s       : Deep Learning Renaissance
                : AlexNet victory (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
                : GPU acceleration
                : ImageNet breakthrough
                : CNN dominance
    
    2017-2025   : Transformers & LLMs
                : Transformer paper (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
                : BERT (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
                : GPT series (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
                : GPT-4.1 & o-series (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
                : Reasoning models
